id.title: ID
id.description: Item/Block ID. If not specified, gets treated as air, resulting in the item being removed.

count.title: Count
count.description: Number of items stacked. Any item can be stacked, even if unstackable through normal means. Values below 0 cause the item to be treated as air, resulting in the item being removed.

components.title: Components
components.description: Additional information about the item. This tag is optional for most items.
